a plant of the mint family, used in cooking as a herb: Two main versions of this herb are grown domestically – winter savory and summer savory. Summer savory is an aromatic annual which is related to rosemary and thyme.
More examplesFewer examplesSummer savory is the kind of herb that's compatible with a wide array of dishes, just the way thyme is.Unlike the annual variety of savory, winter savory is a perennial with a very strong flavour. Savory: there are two main types of this strongly-flavoured herb, which is often used in bean and meat dishes, stuffings and sausages.
